verses.roman:
miśrera āvāsa sei haya alpa sthāna
asaṅkhya vaiṣṇava tāhāṅ haila parimāṇa

synonyms: miśrera āvāsa—the residence of Kāśī Miśra; sei—that; haya—is; alpa sthāna—insufficient place; asaṅkhya—unlimited; vaiṣṇava—devotees; tāhāṅ—there; haila—were; parimāṇa—overcrowded.
translation: Since the residence of Kāśī Miśra was insufficient, all the assembled devotees were very much overcrowded.
